item.title: Selected Projects
item.description: Selected Projects Communicating with Computers This is a DARPA funded project to build intelligent minecraft agent that can communicate and collaborate with humans through chat to build structures. [ video ] Learning Sparse Graph for GNN Used meta-learning techniques to optimize the graph structure of obtain sparse graph for GNN. Causal inference from Protein Expression Data Discovering causal molecular relationships from the evaluation of observational data using do-calculus.
